content:
ANITI’s Research Chair on Deep Learner Explanation and Verification is looking for post-doctoral researchers and PhD students to work on applying automated reasoning in explaining and verifying machine learning models. More information available here.
  About me I am a Research Chair at ANITI, University of Toulouse (FR). My research interests include automated reasoning, artificial intelligence and machine learning. Before joining ANITI, I was affiliated with University College Dublin (IE), the University of Southampton (UK), and with the University of Lisbon (PT). At ANITI, I am the Research Chair of DeepLEVER (Deep Learner Explanation and Verification).
* [ResearcherID](https://publons.com/researcher/2856895/joao-marques-silva/) --
